alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 11:00PM CST until January 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SIMPSON...NORTHERN LAWRENCE AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 1059 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shivers, or near Pinola, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pinola around 1110 PM CST. Mendenhall around 1120 PM CST. Magee and Sanatorium around 1125 PM CST. Martinville around 1130 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include New Hebron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
